thread.title: Florida ZombiCon slaying: 1 dead, 4 others hurt after shooter opens fire (video)
thread.title_full: Florida ZombiCon slaying: 1 dead, 4 others hurt after shooter opens fire (video) | OregonLive.com

author: Associated Press
title: Florida ZombiCon slaying: 1 dead, 4 others hurt after shooter opens fire (video)
text:
FORT MYERS, Fla. — A shooter fled after opening fire at a ZombiCon gathering in Florida on Saturday, killing one person and injuring four others.
The shootings began at 11:45 p.m. Saturday, Lt. Victor Medico of the Fort Myers Police Department told The News-Press. He said the four people injured were being treated at a hospital for injuries that were not life-threatening.
Police early Sunday were searching for a suspect. Fort Myers police did not immediately return a call seeking details.
The annual festival had been expected to draw more than 20,000 fans dressed as zombies, the newspaper said.
A statement on the ZombiCon Facebook page said organizers were saddened by the news and the group takes the safety of its patrons very seriously.
Police officers barricaded an area and told people that downtown was closed.
The organizers of Zombicon, Pushing DaiZies, Inc. are deeply saddened by the news of what happened within the footprint...
Posted by ZombiCon on Saturday, October 17, 2015 Man being taken away on a stretcher by medics. @TheNewsPress #SWFL pic.twitter.com/hlf9wNyREW
— Ben Brasch (@ben_brasch) October 18, 2015
